author: cms-tau-pog
body:
DeepTau: Switched to split training files without memory mapping to be compatible with TensorFlow 2.1 as in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28711. To be propagated to cmsdist together with TF2.1.

It was tested with CMSSW_11_1_X (still with TF1.x) using 1k ttbar events (~3.5k tau candidates) that deepTau with training files with and without memory mapping gives exactly same results (as expected).
title: DeepTau2017v2 without memory mapping
